## Method 2: Use Online Services to Unlock AutoCAD 2013 RAR File with Password
 
Another way to unlock AutoCAD 2013 RAR file with password is to use online services that claim to crack RAR passwords. These services usually require you to upload your RAR file to their server and pay a fee to get the password. However, there are some drawbacks of using online services:

- You need to have a stable internet connection and enough bandwidth to upload and download large files.
- You need to trust the service provider with your confidential data and hope they don't leak or misuse it.
- You need to wait for a long time or even days for the service provider to crack the password.
- You need to pay a high fee for each file and there is no guarantee that they can recover the password.

If you still want to try online services to unlock AutoCAD 2013 RAR file with password, here are some examples of such services:

- [Password Online](https://www.password-online.com/): This service claims to crack any password-protected archive within minutes. It charges $10 for each file and offers a free trial for files up to 10 MB.
- [Lost Password](https://www.lostpassword.com/): This service claims to recover passwords for various types of files, including archives, documents, databases, etc. It charges $29 for each file and offers a free trial for files up to 5 MB.
- [Password Find](https://www.password-find.com/): This service claims to remove passwords from various types of files, including archives, documents, spreadsheets, etc. It charges $19.95 for each file and offers a free trial for files up to 3 MB.
